original_text: Jehoshaphat lived at Jerusalem. And he went out again among the people, from Beersheba to the hill country of Ephraim, and brought them back to the Lord, the God of their fathers.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 예루살렘에 살더니 다시 나가서 브엘세바에서부터 에브라임 산지까지 민간에 두루 다니며 그들을 그들의 조상들의 하나님 여호와께로 돌아오게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he went out again among the people
from Beersheba to the hill country of Ephraim
and brought them back to the Lord
